title: #3 MONSTERS OF ROCK VIDEOS FROM THE 1980s VHS-RIP
description:

Recorded from the show "Power Hour" on SUPER channel late 1980.
Some videos are from MTV and some from Headbangers Ball ( MTV )late 1980.
Some videos appear several times.
Rolling text on some videos.

Excellent quality on tape.

Running time: 180 min of pure hardrock/metal from the 80s.

Watch it in 4:3 format.
